mapper.select: SELECT max(component.id) as id, component.component_name, max(component.description) as description, max(component.picture) as picture, max(component.product_id) as product_id from component, product WHERE product.shop = 'local' AND product.id = component.product_id GROUP BY component.component_name

select component.id as id, component_name, description, picture from component, attribute where product_id = #{product_id} and component.id = component_id group by component.id, component_name, description, picture
mapper.insert: insert into component (product_id, component_name, description) values (#{product_id}, #{component_name}, #{description})
